name: Super Banana Quest 64
description:
Super Banana Quest 64 is a love letter to our favorite Nintendo 64 platformers - With a few surprises. Note that this game was made for a 3 day jam - I might flesh it out one day, but don't expect a mountain of depth. 

Controls:

WASD + Mouse to move around. Space to jump. Controllers are supported! Use escape to quit.

Physics will be replaced in the future!
